ygData.msgSnippet: Mortem was pleased with what she saw. Not only was Zardus a rather intelligent leader, he had the look down too. His sheer size showed off his mightiness.

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Mortem was pleased with what she saw. Not only was Zardus a rather 
intelligent leader, he had the look down too. His sheer size showed off his 
mightiness.
       "Hello Commander. I am Mortem and this is Tal-X." She made reference 
to the large clunky robot next to her with the digital screen that held a 
blue electric face.
       Tal made a welcoming gesture, "I am a Predacon Artificial Intelligence 
unit. State of the art. I live to serve." His personality programming was 
basic, but satisfactory.
       The Ambassador then got down to business. "Alright. I came here to 
track down some bots that are wanted back in Transformer space. And, I also 
came to get all the information possible on this war. Do you think you might 
help me with these things?"

       Hell Beast sent his troops back to quarters after they had unloaded 
all the materials requested by Unicron. Now, he made his way to the bridge to 
report.
       Entering, he found the layout the same. Nothing new. That was good, in 
a way. He went to a nearby computer display and plugged in his data of all 
the materials collected.
       "Sir, here is our find. I hope it was what you were expecting." He 
said, as the list scrolled up over the numerous systems, tools, equitment, 
and parts.

--part1_c0.115e9d15.27e7bbe8_boundary
